projects.title: Grievance Portal, Government of Odisha
projects.description: Built a grievance redressal portal with role-based access, admin panel, and officer dashboards for the Government of Odisha using React, Node.js, MySQL, Hostinger and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: AI Resume Builder
projects.description: Developed a full-stack Resume Builder Web Application using React.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and AWS, featuring real-time resume preview, downloadable PDFs, and customizable templates.

projects.title: Career Align
projects.description: Created an AI agent to parse resumes and match skills with job listings using NLP, Python, AWS. And designed a dashboard to show skill gaps and recommend suitable roles.

projects.title: NGO Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and delivered a responsive NGO portfolio website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimal performance.

projects.title: Campaign Manager
projects.description: Built RESTful APIs for managing campaign data with support for soft deletes and status toggling (ACTIVE/INACTIVE), ensuring robust and scalable backend functionality. Integrated OpenAI to generate personalized LinkedIn outreach messages from user-provided profile data using prompt-based AI generation.

projects.title: Real-Time Crypto Price Tracker
projects.description: A responsive React + Redux Toolkit application that tracks real-time cryptocurrency prices using Binance WebSocket API and manages all state via Redux.

projects.title: Gcek Naval Ncc
projects.description: The website is a comprehensive platform for the GCEK Naval NCC unit, providing information about the unit, its activities, and its members.

projects.title: Smart Sell
projects.description: SmartSell is a full-stack web application designed to streamline the process of selling old smartphones. Powered by machine learning algorithms, the platform provides an accurate valuation of smartphones based on their condition and other key parameters.

projects.title: Lead Management System
projects.description: The Lead Management System, built with React. It allows users to manage, search, and filter leads efficiently with a modern user interface.

projects.title: Role Based Image Management System
projects.description: Developed a full-stack role-based web application with three access levels: User, Admin, and Super Admin. Implemented functionality for uploading, viewing, and deleting images based on user roles. Added a Dark/Light mode toggle for enhanced user experience and built a responsive UI.

projects.title: AWS Automation with Terraform & Python
projects.description: This Project contains solutions for the AWS DevOps assignment including infrastructure as code, scripting, and CI/CD pipeline.

projects.title: GCEK Folio
projects.description: The figma design for the student portfolio website for GCEK students includes all the clubs, library alumni, gallery and events.

projects.title: SAIS Redesign
projects.description: The figma design for the SAIS website redesign.

projects.title: Cyber Fiesta
projects.description: The website to showcase the events and activities of Cyber Fiesta 2024, the tech fest of CSE,GCEK.

projects.title: Farewell
projects.description: The website to showcase the events and activities of Farewell 2024 and an invitation to the seniors, the farewell of CSE,GCEK.

projects.title: Pacific Weather
projects.description: A weather app that displays the current weather and forecast for a given location. The app uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch weather data.

projects.title: Romi finance
projects.description: The website is a comprehensive platform for the Romi finance, providing information about the compan. This project encompasses essential sections including Home, Dashboard, and Earn pages

projects.title: Pacific Quotes
projects.description: Integrated a seamless Twitter sharing feature, allowing users to share their favorite quotes effortlessly. Users can explore a collection of inspiring quotes and their sources, with new ones refreshing at the click of a button.
